prod_desc: Enter miniature battle with the amazing U-Wing Microfighter!
prod_long_desc:
Play out miniature LEGO® Star Wars adventures with this U-Wing Microfighter, featuring folding wings, two stud shooters and space to seat the included U-Wing Pilot with his blaster pistol.
Includes a U-Wing Pilot minifigure.
Features folding wings, two stud shooters, thruster engines at the back and an open cockpit with space for a minifigure to sit.
Fold the wings and fire the stud shooters to repel the enemy.
Also includes the U-Wing Pilot's blaster pistol.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 6-12.
Recreate your own scenes from the blockbuster movie Star Wars: Rogue One.
Measures over 1” high, 4” long and 2” wide.
